{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=LAPAC2600 |asin=B01JOXWG32 |price=500 |fcc_date=06/22/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability=now |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=Q87-LAPAC2600 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF1G18AC-TI |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9990 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9990 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips= |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, WDS, Link Aggregation, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.252 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=B4:75:0E |oui_eth=B4:75:0E }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Business Pro Series Wireless-AC Dual-Band MU-MIMO Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-LAPAC2600/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=LAPAC2600|pid=01t34000003vyhoAAA}} *[http://ui.linksys.com/LAPAC2600/V1.0.00.004/Menu_Status.htm ''Linksys LAPAC2600'' User Interface Demo] *[https://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=205540 ''Linksys LAPAC2600'' System Specifications] "BSL00B-1.6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[SerComm]] Probably [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 + 2x QCA9990 ===Reviews=== *[http://wegotserved.com/2016/09/15/review-linksys-lapac2600-clustering-ac2600-access-point/ ''Linksys LAPAC2600 Clustering AC2600 Access Point'' on '''WeGotServed'''] ===See also=== *[[Linksys LAPAC2600]] - ''Business AC2600 Pro Dual-Band Access Point'' *[[Linksys LAPAC1750PRO]] - ''Business AC1750 Pro Dual-Band Access Point'' *[[Linksys LAPAC1750]] - ''Business AC1750 Dual-Band Access Point'' *[[Linksys LAPAC1200]] - ''Business AC1200 Dual-Band Access Point'' *[[Linksys LAPN600]] - ''Business Wireless-N600 Dual-Band Access Point'' *[[Linksys LAPN300]] - ''Business Wireless-N300 Dual-Band Access Point'' *[[Linksys WAP300N]] - ''Dual-Band Wireless-N300 Access Point''
